about: Raymond's older brother, Elbert, is a master of dance. So ladies, if you're looking for
a man with moves, look no further.  Elbert is also an expert in dealing
with computers; which (indirectly) influenced the direction that Raymond took in his
education and career to become who he is today. Other things that Elbert is credited

with:
  • Anything Raymond knows about Star Trek
• appearing in the mirror when Raymond looks into it
